mapper.select:
SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, ( SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男' ELSE '其它' END ) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'') as nls, datediff(month,b.CSRQ,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, b.MZDM as mz, d.NAME as mzmc, b.HYZK as hyzkdm, ( SELECT CASE b.HYZK WHEN '0' THEN '未婚' WHEN '1' THEN '已婚' WHEN '2' THEN '离独' WHEN '3' THEN '丧偶' ELSE '未知 ' END ) AS hyzkmc, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.SSDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsf, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsq, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzx, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzxz, 'N' as dzc, 'N' as dzmphm, b.ZYDM as zylbdm, i.NAME as zylbmc, b.RYRQ as ryrq, CASE WHEN b.CYRQ IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE b.CYRQ END as cyrq, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN PUB_ZYDMK i on b.ZYDM=i.ID
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, ( SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男' ELSE '其它' END ) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,b.CSRQ,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, b.MZDM as mz, d.NAME as mzmc, b.HYZK as hyzkdm, ( SELECT CASE b.HYZK WHEN '0' THEN '未婚' WHEN '1' THEN '已婚' WHEN '2' THEN '离独' WHEN '3' THEN '丧偶' ELSE '未知 ' END ) AS hyzkmc, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.SSDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsf, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzsq, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzx, ISNULL((SELECT e.NAME FROM EMR_SYS_DQDMK e WHERE b.QXDM = e.DQDM),'N') as dzxz, 'N' as dzc, 'N' as dzmphm, b.ZYDM as zylbdm, i.NAME as zylbmc, b.RYRQ as ryrq, CASE WHEN b.CYRQ IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE b.CYRQ END as cyrq, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN PUB_ZYDMK i on b.ZYDM=i.ID
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.CSRQ AS birth, CASE WHEN b.LXDH is null then 'N' WHEN b.LXDH = '' then 'N' else b.LXDH end as lxdh, ISNULL(b.HYZK,'-9') as hyzkdm, ( SELECT CASE b.HYZK WHEN '0' THEN '未婚' WHEN '1' THEN '已婚' WHEN '2' THEN '离独' WHEN '3' THEN '丧偶' ELSE '未知 ' END ) AS hyzk, b.MZDM as mzdm, d.NAME as mz, 'N' as hkszd, 'N' as csdz, 'N' as gzdw, 'N' as gzdwdz, 'N' as gzdwdh, 'N' as jgd, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, ( SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男' ELSE '其它' END ) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,b.CSRQ,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, t.CJSJ as jlrq, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, b.RYRQ as ryrq, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, b.RYRQ as ryrq, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.ZYHM as zyh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, CONVERT(DATE,'1990-01-01 00:00:00',120) AS cfrq, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, CONVERT(DATE, ISNULL(b.CSRQ, '1990-01-01 00:00:00'), 120) AS csrq, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(e.GHXH)),'N') AS mjzh, b.ZYHM as zyh, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(e.GHLB)),'N') AS jzlb, t.QTBLJLXH as zqtysbh, CONVERT(DATE,'1990-01-01 00:00:00',120) AS tjsj, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfmc, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, isnull(b.LXDH,'N') as lxdh, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, t.QTBLJLXH as syxh, t.TJZT as tjzt, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj, t.YXJL as yxjl FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK e on t.SYXH = e.EMRXH
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, e.GHXH as mjzh, b.ZYHM as zyh, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(e.GHLB)),'N') AS jzlb, t.QTBLJLXH as tysbh, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, ISNULL(a.fjh,'N') as bfh, ISNULL(b.RYCW,'N') as bch, b.HZXM as hzxm, b.SFZH as sfzhm, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN THIS4..ZY_BCDMK a ON a.id = b.RYCW and a.bqdm = b.RYBQ LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK e on t.SYXH = e.EMRXH
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT t.QTBLJLXH as yjlxh, b.HISSYXH as jzlsh, c.PATID as patid, b.HZXM as hzxm, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(e.GHXH)),'N') AS mjzh, b.ZYHM as zyh, b.SFZH as sfzhm, c.KSDM as ksdm, c.KSMC as ksmc, c.BQDM as bqdm, c.BQMC as bqmc, b.BRXB as xbdm, (SELECT CASE b.BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女' WHEN '1' THEN '男'ELSE '其它' END) AS xbmc, CONVERT(DATE, ISNULL(b.CSRQ, '1990-01-01 00:00:00'), 120) AS csrq, ISNULL(convert (varchar,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(convert(datetime, b.CSRQ)))) ,'N') as nls, datediff(month,c.BIRTH,substring(convert(char(8),getdate(),112),1,8)) %12 as nly, ISNULL(t.GXRQ,t.CJSJ) as gxsj FROM EMR_QTBLJLK t LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK c ON t.SYXH = c.EMRXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK b ON b.SYXH = t.SYXH LEFT JOIN PUB_MZDMK d on b.MZDM = d.ID LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK e on t.SYXH = e.EMRXH
AND t.QTBLJLXH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT A.GHXH AS yjlxh, B.SYXH as jzlsh, A.PATID as patid, A.HZXM as hzxm, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(A.GHXH)),'N') AS mjzh, C.ZYHM as zyh, A.GHLB AS jzlb, C.BRXB AS xbdm, CASE BRXB WHEN '2' THEN '女'WHEN '1'THEN '男'ELSE '其它'END as xbmc, C.SFZH as sfzh, isnull(A.YBDM,'N') AS jkkh, D.XXDM AS aboxxdm, E.NAME AS aboxxmc, D.RHJY AS rhxxdm, F.NAME AS rhxxmc, H.jbs AS jbs, H.crbs AS crbs, H.yfjzs as yfjzs, H.sss as sss, H.sxs as sxs, H.gms as gms, H.hys as hys, H.yjs as yjs, H.jzs as jzs, GETDATE() AS gxsj FROM OUTP_JZJLK A LEFT JOIN CPOE_BRSYK B ON A.PATID = B.PATID LEFT JOIN EMR_BRSYK C ON B.EMRXH = C.SYXH LEFT JOIN EMR_BASYK D ON C.SYXH = D.SYXH LEFT JOIN EMR_SYS_ZDFLMXK E ON D.XXDM = E.MXDM AND E.LBDM = '96' LEFT JOIN EMR_SYS_ZDFLMXK F ON D.RHJY = F.MXDM AND F.LBDM = '97' LEFT JOIN EMR_QTBLJLK G ON G.SYXH = A.EMRXH AND G.MXFLDM LIKE 'B-1020%' LEFT JOIN CISDB_DATA..HLHT_RYJL_JBXX H ON G.QTBLJLXH = H.yjlxh
AND A.PATID = #{patid , jdbcType= VARCHAR}

SELECT ISNULL(T1.XH,'N') AS yjlxh, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,T2.GHXH),'N') AS jzlsh, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,T2.PATID),'N') AS patid, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,T2.HZXM ),'N') AS hzxm, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,T2.GHXH ),'N') AS mjzh, ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,T3.SFZH ),'N') AS sfzhm, CASE T3.SEX WHEN '女' THEN '2' WHEN '男' THEN '1' ELSE '3' END AS xbdm, ISNULL(T3.SEX, 'N') AS xbmc, ISNULL(CONVERT (VARCHAR,(YEAR(GETDATE())-YEAR(CONVERT(DATETIME, T3.BIRTH)))) ,'') AS nls, DATEDIFF(MONTH,T3.BIRTH,SUBSTRING(CONVERT(CHAR(8),GETDATE(),112),1,8)) %12 AS nly, ISNULL(T1.CFXH, 'N') AS cfxh, ( SELECT t.DICT_LABEL FROM CISDB_DATA..MBZ_DICT_INFO t WHERE t.DICT_CODE = 'hospitalInfoNo' AND t.DICT_VALUE = 1) AS zzjgdm, ( SELECT t.DICT_LABEL FROM CISDB_DATA..MBZ_DICT_INFO t WHERE t.DICT_CODE = 'hospitalInfoName' AND t.DICT_VALUE = 1) AS zzjgmc, T2.LRRQ AS cfklrq, T1.TS AS cfyxts, T2.KSDM AS cfklksdm, T2.KSMC AS cfklks, (SELECT T7.ZDDM FROM OUTP_MZBLZDK T7 WHERE T2.GHXH = T7.GHXH AND T7.ZDLB = 0 AND T7.ZDLX = 0 ) AS jbzdbm, (SELECT T7.ZDMC FROM OUTP_MZBLZDK T7 WHERE T2.GHXH = T7.GHXH AND T7.ZDLB = 0 AND T7.ZDLX = 0 ) AS jdzd, T1.YPDM AS ywdm, T1.YPMC AS ywmc, T1.YPGG AS ywgg, T1.JXDM AS ywjxdm, T1.JXMC AS ywjx, T1.YPJL AS ywsycjl, T1.JLDW AS ywsyjldw, T1.PCDM AS ywsypcdm, T1.PCMC AS ywsypc, T1.YPYF AS ywsytj, T1.YPYFMC AS ywsytjmc, T1.YPSL*T1.YPJL AS ywsyzjl, T1.FZXH AS cfypzh, T2.YSMC AS klysqm, T2.YSMC AS ysbm, 'N' AS shyjsbm, 'N' AS shyjsqm, CONVERT(DATE, '1990-01-01 00:00:00', 120) AS shyjsqmsj, 'N' AS tpyjsbm, 'N' AS tpyjsqm, CONVERT(DATE, '1990-01-01 00:00:00', 120) AS cftpsj, 'N' AS hdyjsbm, 'N' AS hdyjsqm, CONVERT(DATE, '1990-01-01 00:00:00', 120) AS cfhdsj, 'N' AS fyyjsbm, 'N' AS fyyjsqm, CONVERT(DATE, '1990-01-01 00:00:00', 120) AS cffysj, ISNULL(T2.MEMO, 'N') AS cfbzxx, CONVERT(DECIMAL(18,2),(T1.YPSL*T1.YLSJ)/T1.YKXS) AS cfypje, GETDATE() AS gxsj FROM OUTP_ORDERITEM T1 LEFT JOIN OUTP_ORDER T2 ON T1.CFXH = T2.XH LEFT JOIN OUTP_JZJLK T3 ON T2.GHXH = T3.GHXH LEFT JOIN [THIS4]..YK_YPCDMLK T6 on T1.CD_IDM = T6.idm WHERE T6.yplh='01' AND T3.ZDDM IS NOT NULL AND T3.ZDDM != ''
AND T1.XH = #{yjlxh , jdbcType= VARCHAR}
